title: Boys will be boys
creator_credit: Open Channel Productions, John Dovey and Roger Selleck
brief_description: A discussion film about masculinity , communication and feelings, this video uses role plays to explore male sexuality, focussing on “mateship”, relationships, boys in the home environment and their behaviour towards girls. A number of short scenes are dramatised, and these are followed by a short discussion about issues raised by the dramas.
